CALCIUM.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 at the end of your turn. Provide numerical bonus to cards with affinity to Saria.

SMASH.DESCRIPTION: One-time damage that is higher than 15. Give the target [#EFC851]Stunned[] .

STUNNED.DESCRIPTION: [#EFC851]Water[] [#EFC851]Stain[] is no longer reduced and takes 7 damage when [#EFC851]Gravity[] changed.

GRAVITY.DESCRIPTION: All attack damage is increased when in [#EFC851]weightless[] and decreased when in [#EFC851]overweight[]. Resets at the start of your turn.

GRAVITY_UP.DESCRIPTION: All attack damage increase 30%. Resets at the start of your turn.

GRAVITY_DOWN.DESCRIPTION: All attack damage decrease 30%. Resets at the start of your turn.

FLOWING_SHAPE.DESCRIPTION: Next time you play a card with affinity to Saria or Kristen, play a copy whose value is a certain multiple (number of layers divided by 5) of the original one.

WATER_DAMAGE.DESCRIPTION: A stackable state. Enter [#EFC851]Submersion[] when accumulated to a certain value.

SUBMERSION.DESCRIPTION: A multi-layered state. According to the number of layers, take a certain amount of damage and deal less damage. Dead when accumulated to 4 layers. Reduces 5 [#EFC851]Water Stain[] each turn.

RESEARCH_PROGRESS.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 [#EFC851]Perturbation[] when accumulated to a certain value. The required value increases linearly.

PERTURBATION.DESCRIPTION: Each layer alternately provides linearly increasing layers of [#EFC851]Metallicize[] and [#EFC851]Thorns[] .

STARRING.DESCRIPTION: A summon that deals 5 damage to all enemies at the start of your turn. Prioritizes enemy attacks and blasts when broken, dealing half the total taken damage to all characters. Deals 5 damage to you at the end of the combat.

GOODNIGHT.DESCRIPTION: Removed until end of combat, i.e. [#EFC851]Exhaust[] .

AFFINITY.DESCRIPTION: Different branches to chose when upgrade cards.

EXPERIMENTERROR.DESCRIPTION: When the [#EFC851]Star[] [#EFC851]Ring[] dead，Add same number of [#EFC851]Unscrupulous[] to your discard pile.

CRITICALPOINT.DESCRIPTION: When the [#EFC851]Star[] [#EFC851]Ring[] explodes, damage deal to enemy increases the same number of times.
